DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial compare three currently available management strategy woman persist pregnancy unknown location ( PPUL ) , make at-risk ectopic pregnancy . We recruit hemodynamically stable woman confirm PPUL randomize one three strategy : 1 ) Uterine evacuation follow methotrexate ( MTX ) ( evidence non visualize ectopic pregnancy ) 2 ) Empiric treatment MTX 3 ) Expectant management . Randomization 2:2:1 three arm . After randomization , follow treat clinically indicated progression condition . Primary outcome measure : uneventful decline hCG 5 IU/mL . Secondary outcome measure : re-interventions , treatment complication , health-related quality life , financial cost , future fertility , patient 's preference .
